about.summary: I am Shariar Imtiaz, a Data Engineer & Data Architect with 12+ years of experience designing and delivering big data platforms, cloud-native solutions, and AI-ready infrastructures across telecom, e-commerce, and enterprise domains.I specialize in building secure, cost-optimized data platforms. My expertise includes Oracle Database 23ai (Vector Search, Select AI, GenAI integration), OCI, AWS, Azure, Kafka, Spark, and Airflow, enabling scalable, high-performance data processing and RAG-ready enterprise systems.
highlights: Engineered real-time data pipelines processing 40B+ records/day, generating millions in revenue uplift.
Built trigger frameworks processing 400B+ events daily with Kafka and Ignite.
Migrated analytics workloads to Redshift and designed Teradata offloading solutions, reducing costs by 40%.
Delivered 20+ BI dashboards and intelligent analytics solutions driving data-driven decision-making.
